text: I love this place.  Place is really welcoming, great prices,  awesome service.  A classic Pittsburgh pub.  I will definitely be visiting this place again.
My husband and I frequently go here, we love all the staff. Nice environment and good people.  We enjoy this pub specially after a hard day at work.
Luv it!!   Best wings ever! I luv Gorman's after a rough day at work. Everyone  there is so friendly and welcoming. Jen is the best.
Beware! Rude staff. Watered down drinks. Good for a sad beer on a bad night. Will not be returning with my friends.
It's a straight forward dive bar, good crowd.  they also have a pretty nice deck that's fun to sit with friends on on a warm evening.

WOW! What a great family owned pub. I met the owners and they took the time to talk to me and make sure everything was ok. They seem to know everyone who walks in and even though I'm not a big drinking bar person I felt right at  home. The prices where great too!
